content.text:
{
  "canonical_id": "cut_content_combat_vo_bank",
  "summary_text": "This NPC voiceover bank contains 175 entries with 20 motif mentions across 9 unique motifs. The Sacred Flame motif is dominant (7 hits; example lines: “We swat at flies, snuff out flame,” lore_id=0288b92ad44001ed; “Feral flame of Agheel, burn true...,” lore_id=1a2174311feb51d0). Scarlet Rot is a notable secondary motif (5 hits). The Pilgrim & Journey motif appears (2 hits; example: “Blessed we, at your side, on this journey.” lore_id=1a22e49e0f07b91a). Sap & Flow is present as a minor motif (1 hit).",
  "motif_slugs": [
    "flame",
    "scarlet_rot",
    "pilgrim",
    "sap"
  ],
  "supporting_quotes": [
    "lore_id=0288b92ad44001ed motifs=Sacred Flame text=We swat at flies, snuff out flame,",
    "lore_id=1a2174311feb51d0 motifs=Sacred Flame text=Feral flame of Agheel, burn true...",
    "lore_id=1a22e49e0f07b91a motifs=Pilgrim & Journey text=Blessed we, at your side, on this journey."
  ]
}

{"canonical_id":"cut_content_eveligne_serpent_cultist","summary_text":"Cut-content NPC cut_content_eveligne_serpent_cultist is attested in 13 lore entries (lore_count=13; motif_mentions=2; unique_motifs=2) — source: lore_id edcb25442ea7698d. The recorded top motifs are \"Frost & Hoarfrost\" and \"Martyrdom & Sacrifice\" (motifs listed on lore_id edcb25442ea7698d). Noted quoted line: \"A fine sacrifice indeed.\" (lore_id edcb25442ea7698d).","motif_slugs":["frost","martyrdom"],"supporting_quotes":["edcb25442ea7698d: A fine sacrifice indeed."]}

{"canonical_id":"cut_content_guilbert_redeemer","summary_text":"Cut NPC Guilbert (cut_content_guilbert_redeemer) is recorded with 78 lore entries, 5 motif mentions, and 4 unique motifs. Surviving lines tie him to Storm & Tempest (lore_id=76ef842515da926d), Scarlet Rot Divinity (lore_id=7d705bb8796c66b4), and Dream & Reverie (lore_id=15e5945ea9f0a7d9). Notable lines from the dataset: “It must have been a dream. Strange.” (lore_id=15e5945ea9f0a7d9); “There's an aberration of a blacksmith past the checkpoint that leads to Stormveil.” (lore_id=76ef842515da926d); “That of all the grudges born of the Shattering, Malenia the Rotted is the object of the most profound.” (lore_id=7d705bb8796c66b4).","motif_slugs":["storm","oath","scarlet_rot","dream"],"supporting_quotes":["lore_id=15e5945ea9f0a7d9 motifs=Dream & Reverie text=It must have been a dream. Strange.","lore_id=76ef842515da926d motifs=Storm & Tempest text=There's an aberration of a blacksmith past the checkpoint that leads to Stormveil.","lore_id=7d705bb8796c66b4 motifs=Scarlet Rot Divinity text=That of all the grudges born of the Shattering, Malenia the Rotted is the object of the most profound."]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:albus","summary_text":"Albus is portrayed as an Albinauric resigned to an immovable fate (lore_id=2acc4a2d8e4a0d87) and as someone who regards certain items as a 'quaint treasure' because he and others cannot make the journey (lore_id=3680c571a3f5b4a8).","motif_slugs":["primeval_current","pilgrim"],"supporting_quotes":["lore_id=2acc4a2d8e4a0d87 motifs=Primeval Current text=Alas, this is the immovable fate of all Albinaurics.","lore_id=3680c571a3f5b4a8 motifs=Pilgrim & Journey text=It's only a quaint treasure, for we who cannot make the journey."]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:blackguard_boggart","summary_text":"Blackguard Boggart appears across 86 lore entries and is tied to two motifs: Frost & Hoarfrost and Roots & Veins. The Frost motif is evidenced in the line “Alright then. It's yours, if you can meet me price.” (lore_id=1ceed54af3378450). The Roots motif is evidenced in the line “I ain't ever been more scared, neither. Rooted to the bloody spot...” (lore_id=a2fd8edf24f780bc).","motif_slugs":["Frost & Hoarfrost","Roots & Veins"],"supporting_quotes":["lore_id=1ceed54af3378450 text=Alright then. It's yours, if you can meet me price.","lore_id=a2fd8edf24f780bc text=I ain't ever been more scared, neither. Rooted to the bloody spot..."]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:blaidd","summary_text":"Blaidd is repeatedly tied to the Primeval Current (see lines invoking that motif: lore_id=10957fc2241bc4ee; lore_id=11084d7f6414b9a7; lore_id=06139c19f499fd89). He explicitly links Ranni’s fate being held in stasis to Starscourge Radahn, using Gravity Wells imagery (lore_id=06139c19f499fd89). He remarks on recurring encounters—“we're fated to keep crossing paths”—implying persistent, intertwined destinies (lore_id=10957fc2241bc4ee). He also refers to fighting against a fate Ranni has long dreamt of (lore_id=11084d7f6414b9a7).","motif_slugs":["primeval_current","gravity","frost","trickster"],"supporting_quotes":["lore_id=06139c19f499fd89 — So Ranni's fate is kept in stasis by Starscourge Radahn...","lore_id=10957fc2241bc4ee — Seems we're fated to keep crossing paths.","lore_id=11084d7f6414b9a7 — the fight against her fate she's dreamt of for so long."]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:bloody_finger_hunter_yura","summary_text":"Bloody Finger Hunter Yura's lore emphasizes cold—and specifically Frost & Hoarfrost—alongside references to the Sacred Flame and the Primeval Current (see lore_id=1d22b1510d549be3; lore_id=11943a6e29ca971c; lore_id=38dd8ea9fcc0a57c). His lines evoke a deadly, draconic frost, a warning about the consuming nature of frenzy-flame, and a parting that hints at the Primeval Current and possible reunion.","motif_slugs":["frost","flame","martyrdom","primeval_current"],"supporting_quotes":["lore_id=11943a6e29ca971c motifs=Sacred Flame text=If you inherit the flame of frenzy, your flesh will serve as kindling,","lore_id=1d22b1510d549be3 motifs=Frost & Hoarfrost text=The strength of a mighty dragon. Magnificent, but deadly.","lore_id=38dd8ea9fcc0a57c motifs=Primeval Current text=Perhaps we will meet again, if fate permits."]}

{
  "canonical_id": "npc:boc_the_seamster",
  "summary_text": "Boc the seamster is presented as a devoted attendant who offers his service (lore_id=49762e12335c7587). His associated lore repeatedly invokes frost/hoarfrost imagery (lore_id=49762e12335c7587), contains a cautionary pilgrim/journey line (lore_id=168654d24077998c), and includes a personal reference to a 'rotten life' tied to Scarlet Rot Divinity (lore_id=1e3eff4926d52397). Stats available: lore_count=186, motif_mentions=10, unique_motifs=6.",
  "motif_slugs": [
    "frost",
    "rebirth",
    "scarlet_rot",
    "primeval_current",
    "pilgrim_journey"
  ],
  "supporting_quotes": [
    "Please, do be safe on your journeys. (lore_id=168654d24077998c)",
    "The story of my rotten life... (lore_id=1e3eff4926d52397)",
    "I, Boc the seamster, am forever in your service. (lore_id=49762e12335c7587)"
  ]
}

{
  "canonical_id": "npc:brother_corhyn",
  "summary_text": "Brother Corhyn is an NPC represented in 167 lore entries, with 10 motif mentions across 3 unique motifs. His dominant motif is Trickster & Mask (7 hits), and multiple lines explicitly associate him with the Goldmask (lore_id=03dbf0c153411a63; lore_id=04870771de3431f1; lore_id=0808820afe17d251). He is also tied to Frost/Hoarfrost (2 hits) and Sacred Flame (1 hit).",
  "motif_slugs": [
    "trickster",
    "frost",
    "flame"
  ],
  "supporting_quotes": [
    "From your description, it can be no other than the Goldmask himself! (lore_id=03dbf0c153411a63)",
    "I will soon leave to join the noble Goldmask. (lore_id=04870771de3431f1)",
    "Do you know of the noble Goldmask? (lore_id=0808820afe17d251)"
  ]
}

{
  "canonical_id": "npc:d_hunter_of_the_dead",
  "summary_text": "The NPC 'd_hunter_of_the_dead' appears across 128 lore entries, with 16 motif mentions and 4 unique motifs. The strongest motifs are scarlet_rot (Scarlet Rot Divinity; hits=8, unique_lore=8), root (Roots & Veins; hits=6, unique_lore=6), thorn (Thorns & Brambles; hits=1, unique_lore=1), and frost (Frost & Hoarfrost; hits=1, unique_lore=1). Scarlet Rot themes are explicit in lines about rot and corruption (see lore_id=03e9858bbcdf3c64 and lore_id=3555385b17c06fca), while the Roots motif appears in an exchange referencing Deathroot (see lore_id=32ada4ba19444c00).",
  "motif_slugs": [
    "scarlet_rot",
    "root",
    "thorn",
    "frost"
  ],
  "supporting_quotes": [
    "lore_id=03e9858bbcdf3c64 motifs=Scarlet Rot Divinity text=When grace is sullied, it rots people from the inside. Breaks them.",
    "lore_id=32ada4ba19444c00 motifs=Roots & Veins text=Ah, hello. You've been busy weeding Deathroot, I take it.",
    "lore_id=3555385b17c06fca motifs=Scarlet Rot Divinity text=I thank you, as your brother-in-arms."
  ]
}

{"canonical_id":"npc:edgar","summary_text":"Edgar identifies himself as the castle warden appointed by Lord Godrick (lore_id: 8c7e3bc7e235e47d). He expresses disillusionment and a sense of betrayal about others’ service (lore_id: 761b7cf86232dcf2). He also alludes to fate/Primeval Current in another line (lore_id: 04d8a307dde44988).","motif_slugs":["sap","frost","primeval_current","guardian"],"supporting_quotes":["lore_id=04d8a307dde44988 motifs=Primeval Current
text=And that is how fate has answered…","lore_id=761b7cf86232dcf2 motifs=Frost & Hoarfrost
text=They gave me good service, or so I thought,
but it seems it was all an act.","lore_id=8c7e3bc7e235e47d motifs=Guardian & Threshold
text=I'm Edgar, warden of this castle as ordained by Lord Godrick himself."]}

{
  "canonical_id": "npc:fia",
  "summary_text": "Fia speaks in terms of Oaths & Vows (mentioning loathing and hatred that overshadows them) — lore_id=0dfacee93cf6dcde. She is called a \"foul and rotten witch,\" tying her to Scarlet Rot Divinity — lore_id=4202cb9a70d8d0dd. She also references a blessing that is \"still aflame in your breast,\" linking her to the Sacred Flame motif — lore_id=50bfc1e898d78cb3.",
  "motif_slugs": [
    "flame",
    "oath",
    "scarlet_rot",
    "guardian"
  ],
  "supporting_quotes": [
    "lore_id=0dfacee93cf6dcde text=So it is, that any loathing, any hatred that overshadows them...",
    "lore_id=4202cb9a70d8d0dd text=They call me a foul and rotten witch.",
    "lore_id=50bfc1e898d78cb3 text=The blessing is still aflame in your breast, dear."
  ]
}

{"canonical_id":"npc:finger_reader_crone","summary_text":"Finger Reader Crone references Glintstone & Crystalline material tied to Raya Lucaria (\"Glintstone Eventide\") (lore_id=6301c0fab2a5df40), poses a question about the heart of the Scarlet Rot (lore_id=6685911ca5b89296), and remarks that Stormveil Castle still stands tall (lore_id=690156c6cdc4120f).","motif_slugs":["sacred_flame","glintstone_and_crystalline","storm_and_tempest","martyrdom_and_sacrifice","scarlet_rot_divinity"],"supporting_quotes":["lore_id=6301c0fab2a5df40 motifs=Glintstone & Crystalline text=Traverse Raya Lucaria; \"Glintstone Eventide\"…","lore_id=6685911ca5b89296 motifs=Scarlet Rot Divinity text=Into the heart of the scarlet rot?","lore_id=690156c6cdc4120f motifs=Storm & Tempest text=Stormveil Castle still stands tall!"]}

{
  "canonical_id": "npc:finger_reader_enia",
  "summary_text": "Enia's collected lore emphasizes a Sacred Flame tied to the fate of the Erdtree: she states that only the smoldering flame in the Great Forge of the Giants, on the highest peak in the Lands Between, can burn the Erdtree (lore_id=628360929a913dd3), and that special kindling is required to reignite that flame (lore_id=d86100d69e558636). She also frames the Elden Ring in root imagery, calling it the root of the Golden Order (lore_id=3ddbe1451a8d6e18). Motifs supported by these lines include Sacred Flame (lore_ids=628360929a913dd3, d86100d69e558636), Fungus & Mycelia (lore_id=628360929a913dd3), and Roots & Veins (lore_id=3ddbe1451a8d6e18).",
  "motif_slugs": [
    "sacred_flame",
    "fungus_mycelia",
    "roots_veins"
  ],
  "supporting_quotes": [
    "lore_id=3ddbe1451a8d6e18: \"Great Elden Ring, root of the Golden Order.\"",
    "lore_id=628360929a913dd3: \"Only the smoldering flame in the Great Forge of the Giants, on the highest peak in the Lands Between, can burn the Erdtree.\"",
    "lore_id=d86100d69e558636: \"But special kindling is required to reignite the flame.\""
  ]
}

{
  "canonical_id": "npc:gideon_ofnir",
  "summary_text": "Gideon Ofnir is represented across 222 lore entries and is associated with 24 motif mentions spanning 10 unique motifs; the top motifs listed are scarlet_rot (Scarlet Rot Divinity, 6 hits), sap (Sap & Flow, 3 hits), flame (Sacred Flame, 3 hits), and frost (Frost & Hoarfrost, 3 hits). Specific lore excerpts illustrate these motifs and themes: a Pilgrim & Journey exhortation — \"Make the journey.\" (lore_id=06cb1f8ce8367c0d); a Sacred Flame / Thorns & Brambles passage pointing to a forge in the giants' snow — \"To pass the impenetrable thorns, you seek the forge of the flame of ruin, in the snowy mountaintops of the giants.\" (lore_id=19e316d77898d409); and a Sap & Flow reference to the Great Rune within an amber egg — \"The Great Rune dwells within the amber egg that was Radagon's gift to her.\" (lore_id=4132fb2291aa3b30).",
  "motif_slugs": [
    "scarlet_rot",
    "sap",
    "flame",
    "frost"
  ],
  "supporting_quotes": [
    "lore_id=06cb1f8ce8367c0d text=Make the journey.",
    "lore_id=19e316d77898d409 text=To pass the impenetrable thorns, you seek the forge of the flame of ruin, in the snowy mountaintops of the giants.",
    "lore_id=4132fb2291aa3b30 text=The Great Rune dwells within the amber egg that was Radagon's gift to her."
  ]
}

{"canonical_id":"npc:godfrey_first_elden_lord","summary_text":"Godfrey, the First Elden Lord (npc:godfrey_first_elden_lord) appears in 18 collected lore entries and has one recorded motif mention: Frost & Hoarfrost (1 hit). A representative line tied to this motif is “Thou didst me good service, Serosh.” (lore_id=43ed9a20db5fe2e1).","motif_slugs":["Frost & Hoarfrost"],"supporting_quotes":["43ed9a20db5fe2e1: Thou didst me good service, Serosh. (motifs: Frost & Hoarfrost)"]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:gowry","summary_text":"Gowry speaks of hoarfrost and counting days until Millicent meets her sisters (lore_id=1282496de9e21a76). He also addresses Scarlet Rot Divinity directly—observing that the rotting sickness erodes memory and offering rot incantations (lore_id=083033a717975a74; lore_id=178231e67fa13fdf).","motif_slugs":["frost","scarlet_rot","primeval_current","pilgrim"],"supporting_quotes":["lore_id=083033a717975a74 motifs=Scarlet Rot Divinity text=But the rotting sickness erodes one's memory.","lore_id=1282496de9e21a76 motifs=Frost & Hoarfrost text=Oh how I have counted the days. Millicent shall soon meet her sisters.","lore_id=178231e67fa13fdf motifs=Scarlet Rot Divinity text=Do you have an interest in rot incantations?"]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:gurranq_beast_clergyman","summary_text":"Gurranq invokes Scarlet Rot directly — “Now, rot!” (lore_id=06b00a1acccc05ab). He explicitly references the twin prodigies Miquella and Malenia (lore_id=1ae84907f1332c7f). He also speaks of long dreaming — “I dreamt for so long.” (lore_id=27809fc148744444).","motif_slugs":["scarlet_rot","dream","twin","flame"],"supporting_quotes":["06b00a1acccc05ab — Now, rot! (motifs: Scarlet Rot Divinity)","1ae84907f1332c7f — The twin prodigies, Miquella and Malenia. (motifs: Twinship & Mirrors)","27809fc148744444 — I dreamt for so long. (motifs: Dream & Reverie)"]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:imprisoned_merchant","summary_text":"The imprisoned merchant frames himself as a pilgrim/wanderer: “Of the swiftness of a wanderer's fury.” (lore_id=030de8ef52fdd110) and “Stay away, Us wanderers have had enough.” (lore_id=2d5184bec10f2779). He also offers a familiar, frost-tinged greeting: “How nice of you to stop by, again.” (lore_id=4ac29795dd84d719).","motif_slugs":["pilgrim","frost","scarlet_rot"],"supporting_quotes":["lore_id=030de8ef52fdd110 text=Of the swiftness of a wanderer's fury.","lore_id=2d5184bec10f2779 text=Stay away, Us wanderers have had enough.","lore_id=4ac29795dd84d719 text=How nice of you to stop by, again."]}

{
  "canonical_id": "npc:intro_storyteller",
  "summary_text": "Appearances: 324 lore entries; 26 motif mentions across 9 unique motifs. The figure emphasizes pilgrimage and journey — e.g., \"I wish to journey with you once more.\" (lore_id=08b7cab24ce9d037) and \"Our journey together ends here.\" (lore_id=0eb5f47f339108de) — framing companionship and parting. Bramble imagery presents an impassable obstacle: \"The thorns are impenetrable.\" (lore_id=184b5370b2495aa4). The single most frequent motif is Sacred Flame (11 hits).",
  "motif_slugs": [
    "flame",
    "pilgrim",
    "frost",
    "thorn"
  ],
  "supporting_quotes": [
    "lore_id=08b7cab24ce9d037 motifs=Pilgrim & Journey text=I wish to journey with you once more.",
    "lore_id=0eb5f47f339108de motifs=Pilgrim & Journey text=Our journey together ends here.",
    "lore_id=184b5370b2495aa4 motifs=Thorns & Brambles text=The thorns are impenetrable."
  ]
}

{
  "canonical_id": "npc:irina",
  "summary_text": "Irina appears across 106 lore entries. Her top motifs are Sacred Flame (4 hits, 4 unique lore mentions), Pilgrim & Journey (2 hits, 2 unique), Frost & Hoarfrost (1 hit, 1 unique), and Scarlet Rot Divinity (1 hit, 1 unique). She explicitly offers herself to flame (\"Burn me with the flame, to make me your maiden...\" — lore_id=008f636eb7b3a098) and invokes chaotic fire (\"May the flame of chaos find purchase within you.\" — lore_id=00ad8fa50374eca4). She also expresses a wish for another's escape even at the cost of his honour (\"My sole wish is that he escape, even if his honour should be the price.\" — lore_id=4b1b5e36ac1d1350).",
  "motif_slugs": [
    "Sacred Flame",
    "Pilgrim & Journey",
    "Frost & Hoarfrost",
    "Scarlet Rot Divinity"
  ],
  "supporting_quotes": [
    "lore_id=008f636eb7b3a098 motifs=Sacred Flame text=Burn me with the flame, to make me your maiden...",
    "lore_id=00ad8fa50374eca4 motifs=Sacred Flame text=May the flame of chaos find purchase within you.",
    "lore_id=4b1b5e36ac1d1350 motifs=Frost & Hoarfrost text=My sole wish is that he escape,\neven if his honour should be the price."
  ]
}

{
  "canonical_id": "npc:iron_fist_alexander",
  "summary_text": "npc:iron_fist_alexander has 222 lore entries, 23 motif mentions, and 6 unique motifs. His lines repeatedly evoke frost/hoarfrost (e.g., friendly greeting in lore_id=09d6910557f4d04b and the crude request in lore_id=1164fdedf2c76f80), show bawdy humor (lore_id=1164fdedf2c76f80), and include a dismissive reference to sacred flame and corporeal tempering (lore_id=22bf8c2e5ff6dee6).",
  "motif_slugs": [
    "frost",
    "scarlet_rot",
    "flame",
    "pilgrim"
  ],
  "supporting_quotes": [
    "lore_id=09d6910557f4d04b — \"Ahh, hello! How nice it is to see a friendly face!\" (motifs: Frost & Hoarfrost)",
    "lore_id=1164fdedf2c76f80 — \"Give me a good smack from behind with something nice and big.\" (motifs: Frost & Hoarfrost)",
    "lore_id=22bf8c2e5ff6dee6 — \"I hardly think you're here to temper yourself with flame, considering that fleshly form of yours.\" (motifs: Sacred Flame)"
  ]
}

{
  "canonical_id": "npc:jar_bairn",
  "summary_text": "Jar Bairn appears across 126 lore entries and is associated with 11 motif mentions spanning 4 unique motifs (lore_ids: 0c61d1a2c9945cf9, 12e281411e8ffa46, 1742b1ee8458ac9c). The strongest motifs are frost (5 hits), pilgrim (3 hits), scarlet_rot (2 hits), and sap (1 hit) (lore_ids: 0c61d1a2c9945cf9, 12e281411e8ffa46, 1742b1ee8458ac9c). The character voice emphasizes a fondness for flowers and variety (\"The flowers we have now are nice...\") and a protective resolve in the face of fear and Scarlet Rot (\"Even if I'm scared, I'll still fight to protect everyone.\" / \"One who protects everybody.\") (lore_ids: 0c61d1a2c9945cf9, 12e281411e8ffa46, 1742b1ee8458ac9c).",
  "motif_slugs": [
    "frost",
    "pilgrim",
    "scarlet_rot",
    "sap"
  ],
  "supporting_quotes": [
    "lore_id=0c61d1a2c9945cf9 text=The flowers we have now are nice, but it's a bit boring having the same ones all the time. (motifs=Frost & Hoarfrost)",
    "lore_id=12e281411e8ffa46 text=Even if I'm scared, I'll still fight to protect everyone. (motifs=Scarlet Rot Divinity)",
    "lore_id=1742b1ee8458ac9c text=One who protects everybody. (motifs=Scarlet Rot Divinity)"
  ]
}

{
  "canonical_id": "npc:kenneth_haight",
  "summary_text": "Kenneth Haight is represented in 99 recorded lore entries (lore_count=99) with 7 motif mentions across 3 unique motifs (motif_mentions=7, unique_motifs=3). He frequently references frost/hoarfrost in his dialogue (lore_id=3e994115ca5df632; lore_id=69c885a48e586c49). He also references the Primeval Current (lore_id=06774e10c34890a0). Representative lines include a greeting and a piece of advice (lore_id=3e994115ca5df632; lore_id=69c885a48e586c49).",
  "motif_slugs": [
    "frost",
    "storm",
    "primeval_current"
  ],
  "supporting_quotes": [
    "lore_id=06774e10c34890a0 motifs=Primeval Current text=Oh, indeed, it is a foul fate for a land, to be without a ruler.",
    "lore_id=3e994115ca5df632 motifs=Frost & Hoarfrost text=Ah, nice to see you after so long.",
    "lore_id=69c885a48e586c49 motifs=Frost & Hoarfrost text=Hmph, yes, now allow me to furnish you with a little advice."
  ]
}

{"canonical_id":"npc:knight_diallos","summary_text":"Knight Diallos appears across a large body of lore (lore_count=105) and is associated with three primary motifs: frost, primeval_current, and scarlet_rot (entity stats). Frost & Hoarfrost is attested by two quoted lines: “Left the Volcano Manor. Forging my own path now. Making my own choices.” (lore_id=98e6454303e9c00b) and “Well. Nice to see you again.” (lore_id=d485338baaca6d6b). Primeval Current is referenced in the line “Lanya knows this, I'm certain. Fate has laid hard roads for us both.” (lore_id=d736d959b9d50c80). Scarlet Rot Divinity is listed among his top motifs (top motifs data), though no supporting quote was provided here.","motif_slugs":["frost","primeval_current","scarlet_rot"],"supporting_quotes":["lore_id=98e6454303e9c00b motifs=Frost & Hoarfrost text=Left the Volcano Manor. Forging my own path now.\nMaking my own choices.","lore_id=d485338baaca6d6b motifs=Frost & Hoarfrost text=Well. Nice to see you again.","lore_id=d736d959b9d50c80 motifs=Primeval Current text=Lanya knows this, I'm certain. Fate has laid hard roads for us both."]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:malenia_blade_of_miquella","summary_text":"Malenia, Blade of Miquella, appears in 13 lore entries and is thematically dominated by the Scarlet Rot Divinity motif, which is mentioned 3 times (lore_ids: 064a69b656d61d1a, 51896581e9c55e24, f7289c105c54f0ee). Her known lines express devotion to Miquella (lore_id=064a69b656d61d1a), prophecy/continuance of the scarlet bloom (lore_id=51896581e9c55e24), and direct invocation of the scarlet rot (lore_id=f7289c105c54f0ee).","motif_slugs":["scarlet_rot"],"supporting_quotes":["lore_id=064a69b656d61d1a: O, dearest Miquella, my brother...","lore_id=51896581e9c55e24: One day, the scarlet bloom will flower again...","lore_id=f7289c105c54f0ee: By the scarlet rot."]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:margit_the_fell_omen","summary_text":"Margit the Fell Omen is an NPC with six recorded lore entries (lore_count=6). The Sacred Flame motif appears twice (motif_mentions=2; unique_motifs=1), occurring in two distinct lore entries (lore_id=04fd1da8e30b6502 and lore_id=b9793d8da7aac705). Both recorded quotes invoke the flame motif (see supporting quotes).","motif_slugs":["Sacred Flame"],"supporting_quotes":["Someone must extinguish thy flame. (lore_id=04fd1da8e30b6502)","Emboldened by the flame of ambition. (lore_id=b9793d8da7aac705)"]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:marika","summary_text":"Marika appears across 18 lore entries and is associated with the \"Dream & Reverie\" motif, referenced twice in the lore (lore_id=394b480e38054669; lore_id=85d371f7ffbbace9). Notable lines tied to that motif: \"Beget Order most elegant, from my tender reverie.\" (lore_id=394b480e38054669) and \"When thou canst share in my dream.\" (lore_id=85d371f7ffbbace9).","motif_slugs":["dream"],"supporting_quotes":["lore_id=394b480e38054669 — Beget Order most elegant, from my tender reverie.","lore_id=85d371f7ffbbace9 — When thou canst share in my dream."]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:melina","summary_text":"Melina is strongly associated with the Sacred Flame motif (cited instances: lore_id=008a5b9043fa2050, lore_id=8f48ed1d14a6b313, lore_id=bef7fd1b70ad47c9) and is also linked to Thorns & Brambles in one instance (lore_id=bef7fd1b70ad47c9). Metadata provided: lore_count=30, motif_mentions=4, unique_motifs=2.","motif_slugs":["Sacred Flame","Thorns & Brambles"],"supporting_quotes":["lore_id=008a5b9043fa2050 (motifs=Sacred Flame): \"Lord of Frenzied Flame...\"","lore_id=8f48ed1d14a6b313 (motifs=Sacred Flame): \"The one who walks alongside flame,\"","lore_id=bef7fd1b70ad47c9 (motifs=Sacred Flame, Thorns & Brambles): \"But the flames will also burn the impenetrable thorns.\""]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:merchant_kale","summary_text":"Merchant Kale is thematically dominated by the Sacred Flame—he explicitly requests chaotic yellow fire and frenzied flame in lore_id=0896b8cbece0a582 and lore_id=178ab01f48a468dc. He also invokes Pilgrim & Journey imagery about his people and wandering in lore_id=1d1d4862e4ce2e99. Across 171 lore entries (lore_count=171) and 15 motif mentions (motif_mentions=15), the top motifs recorded are Sacred Flame, Pilgrim & Journey, Frost & Hoarfrost, and Sap & Flow (see the cited lines above for direct examples).","motif_slugs":["sacred_flame","pilgrim_and_journey","frost_and_hoarfrost","sap_and_flow"],"supporting_quotes":["lore_id=0896b8cbece0a582 motifs=Sacred Flame text=Please, bestow unto me the yellow flame of chaos.","lore_id=178ab01f48a468dc motifs=Sacred Flame text=A frenzied flame to melt away the curses, suffering, and despair. And the Order, entire.","lore_id=1d1d4862e4ce2e99 motifs=Pilgrim & Journey text=My people are wanderers all, which I won't deny is one reason..."]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:miriel_pastor_of_vows","summary_text":"Miriel is tied to the Church of Vows and poses the question “How it came to be known as the Church of Vows?” (lore_id=0bce632e8bb0dda0). Miriel formally greets visitors: “I welcome you, to the Church of Vows.” (lore_id=258a8aa84f746e1d). Miriel also states that “it is here, at the Church of Vows, that the great houses of the Erdtree and the Moon were joined.” (lore_id=325bf00e594e7ebf).","motif_slugs":["oath","sap","root","primeval_current"],"supporting_quotes":["lore_id=0bce632e8bb0dda0 text=How it came to be known as the Church of Vows?","lore_id=258a8aa84f746e1d text=I welcome you, to the Church of Vows.","lore_id=325bf00e594e7ebf text=It is here, at the Church of Vows, that the great houses of the Erdtree and the Moon were joined."]}

  ]
}

{"canonical_id":"npc:ranni","summary_text":"Ranni is associated with frost/hoarfrost and invoked alongside a 'doll-witch' image (lore_id=0d88a2f891bd75ba). She bears a fateful, unhealing wound tied to the Primeval Current (lore_id=0d9af185296d4506). She also experiences perception within sleep or dreamed reverie (lore_id=0fe10b4f1d83d039).","motif_slugs":["frost","primeval_current","trickster","dream"],"supporting_quotes":["lore_id=0d88a2f891bd75ba motifs=Frost & Hoarfrost text=Surrendering thyself into the service of a doll-witch...","lore_id=0d9af185296d4506 motifs=Primeval Current text=With a fateful wound, ne'er to heal.","lore_id=0fe10b4f1d83d039 motifs=Dream & Reverie text=Even in my slumber, I sensed it."]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:recusant_bernahl","summary_text":"Recusant Bernahl is presented as a named combatant who claims his brother's will and asserts his identity (lore_id=9ad21d93ef8eeaea). His speech is terse and resolute—accepting conflict and refusing to repeat commands (lore_id=23f1c449fbc94dbd; lore_id=d30872e9a4e8e158). Motif emphasis: Frost & Hoarfrost is a principal motif (3 hits) supported by frost-tagged lines (lore_id=23f1c449fbc94dbd; lore_id=d30872e9a4e8e158), and Scarlet Rot Divinity appears once in the identity/assertion line (lore_id=9ad21d93ef8eeaea).","motif_slugs":["frost","scarlet_rot"],"supporting_quotes":["lore_id=23f1c449fbc94dbd motifs=Frost & Hoarfrost
text=I suppose I have no choice, then.","lore_id=9ad21d93ef8eeaea motifs=Scarlet Rot Divinity
text=I am the recusant Bernahl, inheritor of my brother's will, and you will fall to my blade.","lore_id=d30872e9a4e8e158 motifs=Frost & Hoarfrost
text=I won't say it twice. Stop this."]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:rennala_sweetings","summary_text":"NPC npc:rennala_sweetings appears in 35 collected lore items and registers two motif mentions across two unique motifs. The Sap & Flow motif is attested by the line “by Mother's amber.” (lore_id=0c9800d7cf6840aa). The Frost & Hoarfrost motif is attested by the line “That'd be nice, so very nice.” (lore_id=e525992f1b88c3a4). Top motif stats: Sap & Flow — hits=1, unique_lore=1 (lore_id=0c9800d7cf6840aa); Frost & Hoarfrost — hits=1, unique_lore=1 (lore_id=e525992f1b88c3a4).","motif_slugs":["sap","frost"],"supporting_quotes":["lore_id=0c9800d7cf6840aa motifs=Sap & Flow text=by Mother's amber.","lore_id=e525992f1b88c3a4 motifs=Frost & Hoarfrost text=That'd be nice, so very nice."]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:rhico_dreambrew_apostle","summary_text":"Rhico (the Dreambrew Apostle) speaks of dreambrew as “the nectar of the demigods.” (lore_id=0b350d629a94de22) He offers to share dreambrew but says it will require “four doses of slumber fog.” (lore_id=100f5cfdd2ec8739) He frames this in terms of entering a dream — “the world of your heart.” (lore_id=281d17d1ef668797) All three quoted lines are associated with the Dream & Reverie motif (lore_ids=0b350d629a94de22, 100f5cfdd2ec8739, 281d17d1ef668797).","motif_slugs":["dream","sap","glintstone","frost"],"supporting_quotes":["lore_id=0b350d629a94de22 text=Perhaps you've heard of dreambrew, the nectar of the demigods, once forbidden to we mortals?","lore_id=100f5cfdd2ec8739 text=As I said, if you'd like me to share some dreambrew with you, we'll need four doses of slumber fog, or thereabouts.","lore_id=281d17d1ef668797 text=Into your dream, the world of your heart."]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:roderika","summary_text":"Roderika (npc:roderika) is represented by 154 collected lore entries, with 12 total motif mentions across 4 unique motif families (Frost, Roots, Storm, Trickster). Frost/Foarhost is the dominant motif (7 hits, 7 unique lore); examples of Frost lines include lore_id=071e7f05581675cd and lore_id=3cb3d962603041b2. The Storm motif appears in lore_id=510a9c2b5e6a5646. Roots and Trickster are present in the motif summary (Roots: 2 hits; Trickster: 1 hit) but no supporting quote lore_id for those motifs is included in the provided quotes.","motif_slugs":["frost","root","storm","trickster"],"supporting_quotes":["lore_id=071e7f05581675cd motifs=Frost & Hoarfrost text=Greetings. Nice to see you again.","lore_id=3cb3d962603041b2 motifs=Frost & Hoarfrost text=Master Hewg said it himself, actually, that I'm no mere prentice any longer.","lore_id=510a9c2b5e6a5646 motifs=Storm & Tempest text=Oh, can you pass on a message for me, if you see the little chrysalids in Stormveil Castle?"]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:rykard_lord_of_blasphemy","summary_text":"Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy is recorded with 7 lore entries (lore_count=7). The top motifs are frost (Frost & Hoarfrost) and martyrdom (Martyrdom & Sacrifice), each recorded once across the lore (hits=1, unique_lore=1 for each motif) — see lore_id=85ccbdb4029cabfb. A quoted line links both motifs and the theme of sacrifice: “A fitting sacrifice you shall be, for the Serpent King.” (lore_id=85ccbdb4029cabfb).","motif_slugs":["frost","martyrdom"],"supporting_quotes":["85ccbdb4029cabfb: \"A fitting sacrifice you shall be, for the Serpent King.\" (motifs: Frost & Hoarfrost; Martyrdom & Sacrifice)"]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:smithing_master_hewg","summary_text":"Smithing Master Hewg (lore_count=124) is thematically tied to Frost & Hoarfrost (unique_motifs=1; motif_mentions=3). His lines portray a contempt for an imprisoned monster’s status — “An imprisoned monster does not deserve an apprentice, or a daughter.” (lore_id=0290c62acacd2bd1) — show surprise at an intruder — “I...didn't notice you there.” (lore_id=220a88ee0e0d9926) — and call attention to physical restraints — “I see you've noticed the chains.” (lore_id=2318ea41b6901d40). These three quoted lines collectively instantiate the Frost & Hoarfrost motif (lore_ids=0290c62acacd2bd1, 220a88ee0e0d9926, 2318ea41b6901d40).","motif_slugs":["Frost & Hoarfrost"],"supporting_quotes":["lore_id=0290c62acacd2bd1 text=An imprisoned monster does not deserve an apprentice, or a daughter.","lore_id=220a88ee0e0d9926 text=I...didn't notice you there.","lore_id=2318ea41b6901d40 text=I see you've noticed the chains."]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:songstress_of_haligtree","summary_text":"npc:songstress_of_haligtree utters lines that mention black flames devouring the Erdtree (lore_id=98ac2e84de23e533), the rank malformed twins (lore_id=c46e844065d9d3b8), and that the Lands Between are shrouded by Death's dark fate (lore_id=e1fabc2f1fa9f427).","motif_slugs":["Sacred Flame","Twinship & Mirrors","Primeval Current"],"supporting_quotes":["lore_id=98ac2e84de23e533 motifs=Sacred Flame text=Black flames have devoured the Erdtree,","lore_id=c46e844065d9d3b8 motifs=Twinship & Mirrors text=Nor the rank malformed twins.","lore_id=e1fabc2f1fa9f427 motifs=Primeval Current text=and the Lands Between are shrouded by Death's dark fate."]}

{
  "canonical_id": "npc:sorcerer_rogier",
  "summary_text": "Rogier suggests Lunar Princess Ranni may have plotted \"that fateful night\" (lore_id=0fe04b6d05effb30). He advises entering Ranni's service to \"take a poke around on the sly\" as a way to find out (lore_id=1240226e2ae30abf). He also questions the player's presence in Stormveil Castle (lore_id=15398b18c33a3de6).",
  "motif_slugs": [

    "primeval_current",
    "storm",
    "martyrdom"

  "supporting_quotes": [
    "lore_id=0fe04b6d05effb30: If Lunar Princess Ranni truly is the one who plotted that fateful night,",
    "lore_id=1240226e2ae30abf: And the best way to find out is for you to enter her service and take a poke around on the sly.",
    "lore_id=15398b18c33a3de6: But enough about me, what are you doing here in Stormveil Castle?"

}

{"canonical_id":"npc:sorcerer_thops","summary_text":"Sorcerer Thops (npc:sorcerer_thops) appears across 93 lore entries with 12 motif mentions spanning 4 unique motifs. Other recorded motifs are Roots & Veins, Frost & Hoarfrost, and Pilgrim & Journey (each listed once).","motif_slugs":["glintstone","root","frost","pilgrim"],"supporting_quotes":["lore_id=1cd1b9620f1cb6bd: So, you've found yourself a glintstone key.","lore_id=21a9f9392f04d561: Why not find yourself a glintstone key?","lore_id=34e77085817d5915: And if you find an extra glintstone key, perhaps..."]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:white_mask_varre","summary_text":"White Mask Varre (npc:white_mask_varre) is an NPC recorded across 179 lore entries with 18 motif mentions (lore_id=070a598ef18ed60b, lore_id=07b4a710382ac4f7, lore_id=0e99bf8aa9594267).
